title: ASOBO_material_anisotropic_v2 glTF extension
description: Define a material with a anisotropic effect. The specular on the material is offseted by the two roughness following a custom direction in tangent space.

anisoDirectionRoughnessTexture.description: A texture used to define the aniso direction (RG) and roughnessY orientation (B). The anisotropic use the roughness in comp texture for the roughnessX.
